entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
